full_text: Page 3066 Visiting NYM 5267.06F July 17, 2009 Attachment C Metropolitan Correctional Center - New York Daily Atty. Room / Visiting Room Inventory Date: 07/21/19 Inmate Name Number Unit Officer Time In Time Out Property Epstein 76318-054 ZA (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 9:00 none GS 9:04 12:20 none GN 9:10 12:45 none IN 12:10 1:50 none GN 12:40 2:00 none GS 12:50 2:00 none IN 1:15 3:00 none IN 1:15 3:00 none The only authorized items allowed in the attorney / visiting room are a plain wedding band (without any type of stone), a religious medal (not to exceed a value of $100.00), and legal papers when necessary. i.e. co-defendant meeting. This form will be turned in daily to the Lieutenants Office upon the closing of the attorney/visiting room. After review, the Operations Lieutenant will forward to the Captain's secretary to retain on file for 30 days. Date: E/W Operations Signature: Time: Sensitive But Unclassified DOJ-OGR-00026706

Inmate Name Number Unit Officer Time In Time Out Property
Epstein 76318-054 ZA (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 9:00 none GS 9:04 12:20 none GN 9:10 12:45 none IN 12:10 1:50 none GN 12:40 2:00 none GS 12:50 2:00 none IN 1:15 3:00 none IN 1:15 3:00 none

The only authorized items allowed in the attorney / visiting room are a plain wedding band (without any type of stone), a religious medal (not to exceed a value of $100.00), and legal papers when necessary. i.e. co-defendant meeting. This form will be turned in daily to the Lieutenants Office upon the closing of the attorney/visiting room. After review, the Operations Lieutenant will forward to the Captain's secretary to retain on file for 30 days.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned copy of a handwritten log sheet from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The log sheet records the visits of inmate Epstein to the attorney/visiting room on July 21, 2019. The document contains some redactions, specifically the names of the officers involved in the visits.
